title.narrative: Increase awareness on HIV/AIDS and human health

description.narrative: A regular LWR donor wants to give us $2,500 for HIV/AIDS work in Nepal. We don't presently have a program there for that purpose, but IPD has agreed to accept the donation. As discussed with partner (DAFUO), they have confirmed with us that they can use this fund to "Increase awareness on HIV/AIDS and human health" and have shared with us the tentative activities as follows- - Orientation program on prevention HIV/AIDS at community. - Develop small reading brochure about HIV/AIDS and human health and distribution. - Collection of IEC materials and condoms from District Public Health Office (DPHO) and distribution -Organize a coordination meeting at district. Implementer: DAFUO

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity

job-title.narrative: Regional Program Manager II, Asia and the Middle East
